title: Adding diagrams for AutoAddReplica into Solr Ref Guide
description: Pilot jira for adding PlantUML diagrams for documenting internals.

comments.content: I started looking at this a couple of days ago and adding asciidoctor-diagram wasn't as straightforward right away as I hoped it would be (I neglected to review adding it in the context of building with Jekyll and Ant). I'll need a little bit of time to get back to this, but will do so soon.
